monsters.description:
Deals 1 damage to characters in columns first and second. If necromancer is alive, look into your dungeon deck for the first monster card and put it in play. Shuffle it afterwards.

Whoever kills the Skeleton pack can automatically reshuffle their discard on their library, putting any card he wants on top of it.

monsters.description:
Deals 2 damage to characters in column B.

When the Giant Dog's Skeleton is killed, draw another dungeon card. Whoever kills the Giant Dog's Skeleton gains 1 extra action at the end of his round.
